name: FlowDesk
tagline: Run your service business without being there
description: FlowDesk is the all-in-one operations platform for appointment-based service businesses. Manage scheduling, collect no-show deposits, automate client communication, and coordinate staff — so your business thrives even when you step away.
pain_point: Service business owners lose 25% of revenue to no-shows and can't step away because every operational decision requires their personal involvement.
target_audience: Owners and managers of appointment-based service businesses: medical practices, dental offices, salons, fitness studios, auto repair shops, consulting firms, and professional services with 2-50 staff.
competitive_gaps: No affordable platform combines scheduling with automatic deposit collection and no-show enforcement
Existing tools are industry-locked (healthcare, fitness, beauty) with no cross-vertical solution
No competitor provides operational independence features like staff decision playbooks and escalation paths
Competitors charge $100+/mo for features that should be standard at $29-49/mo
Most tools lack waitlist-to-booking automation when cancellations occur

features.name: Service Catalog Management
features.description: Define services with pricing, duration, provider assignments, availability windows, and add-on options. Support variable pricing for peak/off-peak hours.
acceptance_criteria: Owner can create, edit, and archive services with name, description, duration, and price
Services can be assigned to specific staff members and locations
Variable pricing rules can be set for peak/off-peak time slots
Service categories and add-ons can be configured and displayed on the booking page

features.name: Smart Appointment Scheduling
features.description: Multi-provider calendar with drag-and-drop, conflict detection, buffer times, recurring appointments, and real-time availability calculation.
acceptance_criteria: Calendar displays all providers with day/week/month views and drag-and-drop rescheduling
System prevents double-booking and enforces buffer times between appointments
Recurring appointments can be created with weekly, biweekly, or monthly patterns
Real-time availability updates across all booking channels within 2 seconds

features.name: Client Management CRM
features.description: Client profiles with contact info, full visit history, preferences, internal notes, lifetime value tracking, and no-show scoring.
acceptance_criteria: Each client has a profile page showing contact info, visit history, and financial summary
Client no-show score auto-calculates based on history and flags repeat offenders
Tags and custom segments can be applied for targeted communication
Duplicate client records can be detected and merged

features.name: Online Booking Portal
features.description: Branded, embeddable booking widget showing real-time availability where clients select service, provider, date/time, and pay deposits to confirm.
acceptance_criteria: Public booking page displays available services, providers, and time slots in real time
Clients can complete booking including deposit payment in under 60 seconds
Booking widget is embeddable on external websites via iframe or script tag
Custom intake forms can be attached per service type and are required before confirmation

features.name: No-Show Protection System
features.description: Configurable deposit requirements per service with automatic forfeiture on no-show, client no-show scoring, and waitlist promotion to fill empty slots.
acceptance_criteria: Deposits can be required per service as flat fee or percentage of service price
No-show is auto-detected when client fails to check in within configurable grace period
Deposit is automatically forfeited and client no-show score is incremented on confirmed no-show
Waitlisted clients are automatically notified and offered the open slot

features.name: Payment Processing via Stripe
features.description: Collect deposits, full payments, and tips through Stripe. Support credit cards, Apple Pay, Google Pay with automatic refund processing per cancellation policy.
acceptance_criteria: Stripe Connect onboarding completes in under 5 minutes from settings page
Deposits, full payments, and tips can be collected at booking or point-of-sale
Automatic refunds process according to the configured cancellation policy tiers
Payment methods are securely stored for repeat clients with PCI-compliant tokenization

features.name: Automated Reminders & Follow-ups
features.description: Configurable SMS and email reminders at custom intervals before appointments, confirmation requests with one-click confirm/cancel, and post-visit follow-ups.
acceptance_criteria: Reminders can be configured at multiple intervals (e.g., 24h, 2h before) per service type
Clients can confirm or cancel directly from the reminder message with one click
Post-visit follow-up messages send automatically with optional review request link
Message templates support merge tags for client name, service, date, provider, and location

features.name: Waitlist Management
features.description: Clients join a waitlist for fully-booked time slots. Automatic notifications when slots open from cancellations with priority-based ordering.
acceptance_criteria: Clients can add themselves to waitlists for specific services, dates, or time ranges
When a cancellation creates an open slot, the top waitlisted client is auto-notified
Waitlist supports priority ordering (first-come or VIP tier)
Conversion rate from waitlist to booking is tracked in reporting

features.name: Staff Scheduling & Management
features.description: Define staff availability, working hours, time-off requests, skill-based service assignments, and workload balancing with a self-service staff portal.
acceptance_criteria: Staff members can set their own availability and submit time-off requests for manager approval
Services are assignable to staff based on skills and certifications
Dashboard shows staff utilization percentage and workload distribution across the team
Staff portal allows viewing personal schedule, appointment details, and client notes

features.name: Team Activity Feed
features.description: Real-time feed of bookings, cancellations, check-ins, payments, and notes. Filterable by staff, service, or event type with @mention support.
acceptance_criteria: Activity feed updates in real time showing all booking, payment, and operational events
Feed is filterable by staff member, event type, and date range
Team members can be @mentioned in comments that trigger notifications
Critical events (no-shows, large payments, escalations) are visually highlighted

features.name: Internal Notes & Handoff System
features.description: Per-client and per-appointment notes visible to relevant team members. Pin important notes, use templates, and create handoff checklists between staff.
acceptance_criteria: Notes can be added to client profiles and individual appointments by any team member
Important notes can be pinned to appear at the top of a client's profile
Note templates are available for common scenarios (allergies, preferences, special needs)
Handoff checklists ensure complete information transfer when a client switches providers

features.name: Role-Based Access Control
features.description: Predefined roles (Owner, Manager, Staff, Front Desk) with granular permissions for scheduling, payments, client data, settings, and a full audit log.
acceptance_criteria: Four predefined roles ship out of the box with sensible default permissions
Permissions are granular: view/edit/delete per resource type (clients, appointments, payments, settings)
Staff members only see their own schedule and assigned clients unless given broader access
All permission-sensitive actions are recorded in an immutable audit log

features.name: Cancellation Policy Builder
features.description: Visual editor for creating tiered cancellation policies with configurable grace periods, refund percentages, and penalty fees. Preview as clients see it.
acceptance_criteria: Policies can define multiple tiers (e.g., full refund >48h, 50% refund 24-48h, no refund <24h)
Different policies can be assigned to different service types
A live preview shows exactly how the policy appears on the booking page
Grace period after appointment start time is configurable before a no-show is triggered

features.name: Client Import/Export
features.description: Bulk import clients from CSV with intelligent field mapping and duplicate detection. Export client lists, history, and financial data. Migration wizards for common platforms.
acceptance_criteria: CSV upload with drag-and-drop and automatic column-to-field mapping suggestions
Duplicate detection flags potential matches for review before import completes
Full client data (profiles, history, balances) exportable as CSV or JSON
Guided migration wizard available for Square Appointments, Acuity, and Calendly

features.name: Advanced Search & Filtering
features.description: Full-text search across clients, appointments, and notes. Multi-criteria filters with saved presets and a quick-filter sidebar on all list views.
acceptance_criteria: Global search returns results across clients, appointments, notes, and services in under 500ms
Filters support multiple criteria: date range, service, provider, status, tags, custom fields
Filter presets can be saved, named, and shared with team members
All list views include a collapsible sidebar with quick-filter controls

features.name: Custom Fields
features.description: Add business-specific fields to client profiles and appointment records. Support text, number, date, dropdown, checkbox, and file upload types.
acceptance_criteria: Custom fields can be created with six field types: text, number, date, dropdown, checkbox, file
Fields can be marked required or optional and scoped to specific service types
Custom field values appear in client profiles and are included in search/filter results
Custom fields can be added to booking intake forms

features.name: Bulk Operations
features.description: Select multiple clients for bulk messaging or tag assignment. Bulk reschedule when a provider is unavailable. Batch invoice generation.
acceptance_criteria: Multi-select checkbox on client and appointment lists enables bulk action toolbar
Bulk messaging sends personalized SMS/email to selected clients with merge tags
Bulk reschedule reassigns all of a provider's appointments to another provider or new dates
Batch invoicing generates and optionally sends invoices for all selected outstanding balances

features.name: Multi-Location Support
features.description: Manage multiple business locations from a single dashboard with per-location services, staff, availability, and reporting.
acceptance_criteria: New locations can be added with independent addresses, hours, and contact info
Services and staff can be assigned per-location or shared across locations
Clients can book at any location and their history is unified across all locations
Reporting can be filtered or aggregated by location

features.name: Operations Dashboard
features.description: Real-time KPIs including utilization rate, no-show rate, revenue, and bookings. Daily/weekly/monthly trends with per-provider performance metrics.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard loads with real-time KPI cards: today's bookings, utilization %, no-show rate, revenue
Trend charts display daily/weekly/monthly data with year-over-year comparison toggle
Per-provider performance breakdown shows individual utilization, revenue, and client ratings
Dashboard widget layout is customizable via drag-and-drop

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.description: Revenue breakdowns by service, provider, location, and time period. Client lifetime value tracking, revenue forecasting, and CSV/PDF export.
acceptance_criteria: Revenue can be sliced by service type, provider, location, and arbitrary date ranges
Average transaction value and client lifetime value calculate automatically
Revenue forecast projects next 30/60/90 days based on confirmed upcoming bookings
All reports are exportable as CSV and formatted PDF

features.name: No-Show & Cancellation Reports
features.description: No-show rate trends by day of week, time of day, and service type. Repeat offender lists, deposit forfeiture reports, and cancellation reason analysis.
acceptance_criteria: No-show rate heatmap shows patterns by day of week and hour of day
Repeat no-show offender list ranks clients by no-show count with last contact date
Deposit collection and forfeiture totals are summarized with month-over-month trends
Cancellation reasons are categorized and charted for pattern identification

features.name: Calendar Sync
features.description: Two-way sync with Google Calendar, Outlook, and Apple Calendar. Block personal events to prevent double-booking with per-provider connection settings.
acceptance_criteria: OAuth connection flow for Google Calendar and Microsoft Outlook completes in under 30 seconds
New bookings and cancellations sync bidirectionally within 60 seconds
Personal calendar events block availability without exposing event details to the team
Each provider can connect their own calendar independently

features.name: Webhook & API Access
features.description: RESTful API for all core resources with configurable webhooks for booking, cancellation, and payment events. API key management with rate limiting.
acceptance_criteria: RESTful API covers CRUD operations for clients, appointments, services, and payments
Webhooks can be configured for 10+ event types with retry logic on failure
API keys are manageable from settings with per-key rate limits and scoping
Interactive API documentation is available with a sandbox environment

features.name: Business Settings & Branding
features.description: Configure business name, logo, colors, contact info, business hours, and holiday schedules. Customize booking page appearance and email templates.
acceptance_criteria: Business profile includes name, logo, brand colors, address, phone, and email
Business hours and holiday closures are configurable and enforced across all booking channels
Booking page URL, layout, and welcome messaging are customizable
Email templates use brand colors and logo automatically

features.name: Billing & Subscription Management
features.description: Self-service plan management with upgrades, downgrades, and cancellations. Usage metering for appointments, SMS credits, and team seats.
acceptance_criteria: Users can upgrade, downgrade, or cancel their plan from the billing settings page
Usage meters display current consumption of appointments, SMS credits, and team seats
Invoice history is accessible with downloadable PDF receipts
Annual billing option provides a visible discount over monthly pricing

features.name: Guided Onboarding Wizard
features.description: Step-by-step setup flow: business info, services, staff, availability, booking page. Includes import wizard and sample data option.
acceptance_criteria: Onboarding wizard walks through 5 steps: business info → services → staff → availability → booking page
Each step can be skipped and revisited later from a progress checklist
Sample data can be loaded to explore features before entering real business data
Estimated setup time is displayed and the wizard completes in under 10 minutes

features.name: Mobile-Responsive Client Portal
features.description: Clients view upcoming appointments, reschedule, cancel, pay balances, and rebook previous services from any device with push notification support.
acceptance_criteria: Client portal is fully functional on mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
Clients can view, reschedule, and cancel upcoming appointments with policy enforcement
Payment history and outstanding balances are visible with one-click pay option
One-click rebooking allows clients to instantly schedule the same service with the same provider

features.name: Quick Actions & Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: Global command palette (Cmd/Ctrl+K) for instant access to clients, appointments, and actions. Configurable keyboard shortcuts for power users.
acceptance_criteria: Cmd/Ctrl+K opens a command palette with fuzzy search across clients, appointments, and actions
Keyboard shortcuts exist for new booking, check-in, and navigation between major views
Quick-action buttons on the dashboard provide one-click access to common workflows
Shortcut preferences are configurable per user from account settings

hero.headline: Your Service Business, Running Without You
hero.subheadline: Eliminate no-shows with automatic deposits. Automate scheduling, reminders, and operations. Finally take a day off without losing revenue.

problem.headline: Your business can't survive a week without you
points: 25% of your appointment slots are lost to no-shows — and you have no way to collect deposits or automatically fill the gaps
You're juggling 5+ disconnected tools for scheduling, payments, reminders, and client management that don't share data
Every decision requires you personally: staff can't handle exceptions, clients call you directly, and taking a day off means lost revenue

solution.headline: One platform to run your entire front office
solution.description: FlowDesk combines appointment scheduling, no-show protection with automatic deposits, client management, staff coordination, and operational workflows into a single platform. Your team knows exactly what to do, clients book and pay seamlessly, and you finally get your time back.

faq.question: Is there a free plan?
faq.answer: Yes. FlowDesk is free for solo operators with up to 50 appointments per month. Paid plans start at $29/mo for teams and unlock deposits, automation, and multi-provider scheduling.

faq.question: What types of businesses is FlowDesk for?
faq.answer: Any appointment-based service business: medical and dental practices, salons, barbershops, fitness studios, auto repair shops, consulting firms, tutoring centers, and professional services.

faq.question: How does no-show protection work?
faq.answer: You set deposit requirements per service (flat fee or percentage). Clients pay when booking. If they no-show past your grace period, the deposit is automatically forfeited and the slot is offered to the next person on your waitlist.

faq.question: Can I migrate from my current scheduling tool?
faq.answer: Yes. FlowDesk includes guided migration wizards for Square Appointments, Acuity Scheduling, and Calendly. You can also bulk-import clients and history via CSV.

faq.question: Does FlowDesk handle payments?
faq.answer: FlowDesk integrates with Stripe to collect deposits, full payments, and tips. We support credit cards, Apple Pay, and Google Pay. Refunds process automatically based on your cancellation policy.
